# cancom_cmsmgw_gateway (Resource)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cancom_cmsmgw_gateway" "<resourece-name>" {
   customer = "<ACCT Number>"
   name = "<name>"
   size = "<small, medium, larege"
   nat_translation = false
   description = "<a description for this gateway>"
}
```
